glsa.title: ntp: Certificate validation error
glsa.synopsis: An error in the OpenSSL certificate chain validation in ntp might allow for spoofing attacks.

background.p: ntp contains the client and daemon implementations for the Network Time Protocol.

description.p: It has been reported that ntp incorrectly checks the return value of the EVP_VerifyFinal(), a vulnerability related to CVE-2008-5077 (GLSA 200902-02).

impact.p: A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to spoof arbitrary names to conduct Man-In-The-Middle attacks and intercept sensitive information.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All ntp users should upgrade to the latest version:
